name: JBFundingCycleStore
description: Manages funding cycle configurations and scheduling.

functionDecorators.name: configureFor
functionDecorators.description: Configures the next eligible funding cycle for the specified project. Only a project's current controller can configure its funding cycles._data.duration The duration of the funding cycle. Measured in days. Set to 0 for no expiry and to be able to reconfigure anytime._data.discountRate A number from 0-1000000000 indicating how valuable a contribution to this funding cycle is compared to previous funding cycles. If it's 0, each funding cycle will have equal weight. If the number is 900000000, a contribution to the next funding cycle will only give you 10% of tickets given to a contribution of the same amoutn during the current funding cycle._data.ballot The new ballot that will be used to approve subsequent reconfigurations.

parameterDecorators.name: _projectId
parameterDecorators.description: The ID of the project being configured.

parameterDecorators.name: _metadata
parameterDecorators.description: Data to associate with this funding cycle configuration.

parameterDecorators.name: _mustStartAtOrAfter
parameterDecorators.description: The time before which the initialized funding cycle can't start.

returnDecorators.description: The funding cycle that the configuration will take effect during.

functionDecorators.name: currentBallotStateOf
functionDecorators.description: The current ballot state of the project.

parameterDecorators.name: _projectId
parameterDecorators.description: The ID of the project to check the ballot state of.

functionDecorators.name: currentOf
functionDecorators.description: The funding cycle that is currently active for the specified project. Returns an empty funding cycle with all properties set to 0 if a current funding cycle of the project is not found.

parameterDecorators.name: _projectId
parameterDecorators.description: The ID of the project to get the current funding cycle of.

functionDecorators.name: directory
functionDecorators.description: The directory of terminals and controllers for projects.

functionDecorators.name: get
functionDecorators.description: Get the funding cycle with the given configuration for the specified project.

parameterDecorators.name: _projectId
parameterDecorators.description: The ID of the project to which the funding cycle belongs.

parameterDecorators.name: _configuration
parameterDecorators.description: The configuration of the funding cycle to get.

functionDecorators.name: latestConfigurationOf
functionDecorators.description: The latest funding cycle configuration for each project. _projectId The ID of the project to get the latest funding cycle configuration of.

functionDecorators.name: queuedOf
functionDecorators.description: The funding cycle that's next up for the specified project. Returns an empty funding cycle with all properties set to 0 if a queued funding cycle of the project is not found.

parameterDecorators.name: _projectId
parameterDecorators.description: The ID of the project to get the queued funding cycle of.
